title: Efficient Learning Design through Cognitive Load Theory and Learning Strategy Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental cognitive psychology concepts
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Emphasizes practical learning strategies for professional development with smartphone-based content in resource-constrained settings

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three types of cognitive load: intrinsic, extraneous, and germane.
Learners can apply at least two strategies to efficiently manage their cognitive resources in given work situations.
Learners can design learning strategies applicable to real-world tasks through microlearning modules provided in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
